enterpriseGuide.feature3: Imikorere yo Kwemeza Ibikubiye mu Birimo

userGuide.title: Ubuyobozi bw'Abakoresha
userGuide.description: Byose ukeneye kugira ngo ukore, usesengure, kandi ushyire ahagaragara ibikubiye. Ni byiza cyane ku bakora ibikubiye ku rubuga n'abamamaza.
userGuide.feature1: Ibikoresho byo Gutunganya Ibirimo n'Ubuhanga bwo Kumenya Ibikoresho
userGuide.feature2: Isesengura ry'ibikubiye mu nyandiko no kubahiriza amategeko

overview.intro: Nk'umuyobozi w'urubuga, ufite uburenganzira bwo kubona ibikoresho birambuye byo gukurikirana no gucunga urubuga rwose rwa Contentry. Iyi mfashanyigisho izagufasha gusobanukirwa ubushobozi bwawe bwo kuyobora.
overview.dashboardDesc: Dashboard y'Ubuyobozi itanga ishusho y'ibikorwa n'ubuzima bw'urubuga.
overview.feature1: Gukurikirana ibikorwa by'umukoresha mu gihe nyacyo
overview.tip: Sura Ubuyobozi bwa interineti buri gihe kugira ngo umenye amakuru ajyanye n'ibibera kuri platform no kumenya ibibazo bishobora kubaho hakiri kare.

userManagement.intro: Gucunga umukoresha ni urwego rw'ingenzi rw'ubuyobozi rugufasha kugenzura abakoresha bose n'ibigo kuri uru rubuga.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Jya mu gice cyo gucunga abakoresha kugira ngo urebe, ushakishe, kandi ucunge abakoresha bose ba platform.
userManagement.feature1: Shakisha kandi uhuze abakoresha ukurikije amazina yabo, imeri, cyangwa inshingano zabo
userManagement.feature2: Reba umwirondoro w'abakoresha urambuye n'amateka y'ibikorwa
userManagement.feature4: Guhagarika cyangwa gusiba konti z'abakoresha igihe bibaye ngombwa
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry ifite inshingano eshatu z'ingenzi z'abayikoresha:
userManagement.role1: Ubuyobozi: Uburyo bwose bwo gukoresha urubuga hamwe n'ubushobozi bwo gushyiraho sisitemu
userManagement.role2: Umuyobozi w'ikigo: Ayobora itsinda ry'ikigo cye n'igenamiterere ryacyo
userManagement.role3: Umukoresha: Ibikoresho bisanzwe byo gukora no gusesengura ibikubiye mu nyandiko
userManagement.warning: Buri gihe genzura ingaruka mbere yo guhindura inshingano z'abakoresha cyangwa gusiba konti. Ibi bikorwa bishobora kugira ingaruka ku mikorere y'itsinda.

analytics.intro: Isesengura ritanga ubumenyi bwimbitse ku buryo urubuga rukoreshwa mu bigo byose n'abakoresha.
analytics.metric1: Abakoresha bose bakora n'uko iterambere rigenda rizamuka
analytics.metric2: Ingano yo gukora no gusesengura ibikubiye mu nyandiko
analytics.metric5: Amanota yo kubahiriza amategeko n'ibyago mu bigo byose
analytics.tip: Kohereza raporo z'isesengura ry'ibiganiro by'abafatanyabikorwa ukoresheje uburyo bwo Kuramo Raporo.

financials.intro: Igice cy'Incamake y'Imari gitanga uburyo bwo kubona ibipimo by'amafaranga yinjira kuri platform n'abiyandikisha.
financials.revenueDesc: Kugenzura ubuzima bw'imari n'uburyo abafatabuguzi bahagaze mu bigo byose.

systemConfig.intro: Igenamiterere rya sisitemu rigufasha gucunga igenamiterere n'ishyirwa hamwe rya platform yose.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Gushyiraho no kugenzura ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’abandi bantu:
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API yo gutangaza imbuga nkoranyambaga
systemConfig.integration2: Serivisi za AI zo gukora no gusesengura ibikubiye mu nyandiko
systemConfig.integration3: Gutunganya uburyo bwo kwishyura hakoreshejwe Stripe
systemConfig.tip: Buri gihe gerageza ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’amakuru mu buryo busanzwe mbere yo guhindura imiterere y’umusaruro.

gettingStarted.intro: Murakaza neza muri Contentry! Nk'umuyobozi w'ikigo, ufite ibikoresho byo gucunga itsinda ryawe, gushyiraho amabwiriza agenga ibikubiye mu kinyamakuru, no kwemeza ko ikirango gihoraho.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Kurikiza izi ntambwe kugira ngo ushyireho konti y'ikigo cyawe:
gettingStarted.step1: Jya ku Igenamiterere > Ikigo cy'ubucuruzi kugira ngo winjire kuri dashboard y'ikigo cyawe
gettingStarted.step2: Shyira amabwiriza n'ingamba by'ikirango cy'ikigo cyawe ku Kigo cy'Ubumenyi
gettingStarted.step3: Tumira abagize ikipe yawe kandi ubahe imirimo ikwiye
gettingStarted.step4: Gushyiraho uburyo bwo kwemeza isuzuma ry'ibikubiye mu nyandiko
gettingStarted.tip: Uzuza gahunda yawe y'ishingiro ry'ubumenyi mbere yo gutumira abagize itsinda kugira ngo barebe neza ko bashobora kubona amabwiriza agenga ikirango kuva ku munsi wa mbere.

teamManagement.intro: Imicungire myiza y'itsinda iratuma habaho imikoranire myiza no kugenzura neza uburyo bwo kugera ku bantu mu kigo cyawe.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Ongeramo abanyamuryango bashya mu ikipe y'ikigo cyawe:
teamManagement.feature1: Andika aderesi imeri y'umuntu uri mu ikipe
teamManagement.feature2: Hitamo inshingano zabo (Uwaremye, Umuyobozi, cyangwa Umuyobozi)
teamManagement.role1: Uwahanze: Ashobora gukora no kohereza ibikubiye mu nyandiko kugira ngo byemezwe
teamManagement.role2: Umuyobozi: Ashobora kwemeza/kwanga ibikubiye mu nyandiko no gucunga ababikora
teamManagement.role3: Ubuyobozi: Uburyo bwose bwo kwinjira mu kigo harimo kwishyura no gushyiraho uburyo bwo kubikuza
teamManagement.tip: Ubutumire burarangira nyuma y'iminsi 7. Ibutsa abagize itsinda kwakira ubutumire bwabo vuba.

knowledgeBase.intro: Ishingiro ry'Ubumenyi ni ububiko bw'ingenzi bw'ikigo cyawe bw'amabwiriza y'ikirango, politiki, n'amategeko agenga ibikubiye muri iki gitabo. Inyandiko zashyizwe hano zimenyesha ibikubiye mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na AI ku bagize itsinda bose.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Ongeraho inyandiko zizayobora ikorwa ry'ibikubiye mu nyandiko:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Amabwiriza agenga imiterere y'ikirango n'amabwiriza agenga ijwi
knowledgeBase.docType3: Amabwiriza yo gutangaza amakuru ku mbuga nkoranyambaga
knowledgeBase.tip: Shyira amabwiriza y'ingenzi y'ikirango cyawe mbere na mbere. Urwego rw'ubuhanga mu by'ubwenge (AI) rushyira imbere inyandiko mu kigo cy'ubumenyi kurusha izindi zose zishyirwa ku rubuga n'abakoresha ku giti cyabo.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Uburyo bwo kwemeza butuma ibikubiye byose byujuje ibisabwa n'ikigo cyawe mbere yo kubisohora.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Ibikubiye muri iki cyiciro binyura muri ibi byiciro:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Uwaremye akora cyangwa agasesengura ibikubiye mu nyandiko
approvalWorkflow.step2: Ibikubiye muri ibyo bikubiye mu nyandiko bitangwa kugira ngo byemezwe (nibiba ngombwa)
approvalWorkflow.step4: Ibikubiye mu nyandiko byemewe bishobora gushyirwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga
approvalWorkflow.warning: Shyiraho ibisabwa mu igenamiterere kugira ngo urebe neza ko ibikubiye byose bisuzumwa mbere yo kubisohora.

billing.intro: Genzura ifatabuguzi ry'ikigo cyawe kandi ukurikirane ikoreshwa ry'inguzanyo.
billing.feature1: Ibisobanuro birambuye ku igenamigambi rigezweho n'itangwa ry'inguzanyo

adminUsersPage.title: Imicungire y'Abakoresha
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Gucunga abakoresha urubuga rwose
adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Ese wizeye ko ushaka gusiba uyu mukoresha?

deleteModal.title: Siba Umukoresha
deleteModal.description: Ibi bizasiba burundu umukoresha n'amakuru yose ajyanye nabyo:

gettingStarted.intro: Murakaza neza kuri Contentry! Iyi mfashanyigisho izagufasha gukora ibintu bikurura kandi byujuje ibisabwa ukoresheje ibikoresho bikoresha ubuhanga bwa AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Shyiraho umwirondoro wawe ukoresheje amakuru nyayo
gettingStarted.step3: Kora Umwirondoro w'Ingamba z'Ikirango cyawe cyangwa ubukangurambaga bwawe
gettingStarted.step4: Kora igice cyawe cya mbere cy'ibirimo
gettingStarted.tip: Tangira ukoresheje imiterere y'ingamba kugira ngo umenye neza ko ibikubiye mu nyandiko yawe byose bigumana ijwi n'ubutumwa bihoraho.

contentCreation.intro: Gukora ibikubiye muri Contentry hakoreshejwe ubuhanga bwa "AI" bigufasha gukora inyandiko zikurura abantu mu masegonda make.
contentCreation.generateDesc: Kora ibikubiye mu nyandiko ukoresheje ubuhanga bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina (AI):
contentCreation.feature1: Andika ingingo cyangwa ubutumwa busobanura icyo ushaka koherezaho
contentCreation.feature2: Hitamo porogaramu zawe (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, nibindi)
contentCreation.feature4: Kora ishusho ijyanye nayo ku buryo bushoboka
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: Tegura ingengabihe y'ibikubiye mu gitabo cyawe:
contentCreation.schedule1: Shyiraho gahunda zihoraho zo gukora ibikubiye mu nkuru
contentCreation.schedule2: Hitamo iminsi n'amasaha byihariye byo kohereza ubutumwa mu buryo bwikora
contentCreation.schedule3: Fungura uburyo bwo kohereza ubutumwa bwikora cyangwa isuzuma n'intoki mbere yo gusohora
contentCreation.tip: Koresha agasanduku ka 'Ibikubiye mu kwamamaza' mugihe utegura inyandiko zo kwamamaza kugira ngo urebe neza ko isesengura ry'amategeko risuzuma amabwiriza yo kwamamaza.

analyzeContent.intro: Ikimenyetso cya Analyse Content gisuzuma ibikubiye mu nyandiko yawe kugira ngo kirebe niba bikurikiza amategeko, ko umuco w’umuntu uzwi, kandi ko ikirango cyawe gihuye n’ibyo cyanditse.
analyzeContent.howToTitle: Uburyo bwo gusesengura ibikubiye mu gitabo
analyzeContent.howToDesc: Ohereza ibikubiye muri iyi nyandiko kugira ngo bisesengurwe:
analyzeContent.step1: Jya ku Gutunganya Ibirimo > Sesengura Ibirimo
analyzeContent.step2: Shyira ibikubiye mu nyandiko yawe mu mwanya w'inyandiko
analyzeContent.step3: Hitamo umwirondoro w'ingamba ukurikije aho uherereye
analyzeContent.step4: Kanda ku isesengura kugira ngo ubone ibitekerezo birambuye
analyzeContent.type2: Gushyira imbere umuco mu turere dutandukanye
analyzeContent.tip: Buri gihe sesengura ibikubiye mu nyandiko mbere yo kubishyira ku mbuga zo hanze, cyane cyane ku bukangurambaga bugamije uturere twinshi.

strategicProfiles.intro: Imyirondoro y’ingamba isobanura imiterere, imiterere, n’amabwiriza yo guhanga no gusesengura ibikubiye mu nyandiko.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Sobanura abantu bagenewe uwo mwirondoro n'icyo ugamije
strategicProfiles.feature3: Shyira inyandiko n'amabwiriza byihariye ku mwirondoro wawe
strategicProfiles.feature4: Shyiraho inyuguti n'uburyo bwo gukurura ibintu bisanzwe
strategicProfiles.tip: Kora Imyirondoro y'Ingamba zitandukanye ku bukangurambaga butandukanye, ibirango, cyangwa amasoko yo mu karere.

socialAccounts.intro: Huza konti zawe zo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga kugira ngo utangaze ibintu bivuye kuri Contentry.
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Urubuga rw'umuntu ku giti cye n'urw'ikigo
socialAccounts.platform2: Twitter/X - Konti z'umuntu ku giti cye
socialAccounts.warning: Komeza guhuza konti yawe nkoranyambaga ku gihe. Amanota arangiye ashobora kubuza ko inyandiko zateguwe zitangazwa.

approvalProcess.intro: Niba ikigo cyawe gifite uburyo bwo kwemeza imirimo, ibikubiye mu nyandiko bigomba gusuzumwa mbere yo kubisohora.
approvalProcess.step1: Kora cyangwa usesengure ibikubiye mu nyandiko yawe
approvalProcess.step2: Kanda kuri 'Ohereza kugira ngo wemezwe' kugira ngo wohereze umuyobozi wawe
approvalProcess.step3: Kurikirana uko kwemezwa ku murongo w'ibyemejwe bigitegerejwe
approvalProcess.tip: Ongeraho inyandiko mu gihe wohereza ibikubiye mu nyandiko kugira ngo abasuzuma basobanukirwe ibijyanye n'ibyemezo byawe byo guhanga udushya.

aboutGuide.title: Ibijyanye n'imikorere myiza
aboutGuide.description: Menya icyo Contentry igamije kandi uvumbure uburyo bwiza bwo kunoza ikorwa ry'ibikubiye mu nyandiko zawe, amasezerano y'ibirango byawe, n'imyirondoro y'abakora ibintu byinshi.
aboutGuide.feature2: Inama zo Kunoza Ibikubiye mu Itsinda
aboutGuide.feature3: Ingamba zo Gutanga Amasezerano ku Kirango
aboutGuide.feature4: Gushyiraho Umwirondoro w'abagira uruhare mu iterambere

sections.influencerProfiles: Imiterere y'abantu bafite uruhare mu guteza imbere

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry ni urubuga rw’ubuhanga ku bikubiye ku rubuga rukoresha ubuhanga bwa "AI" rwagenewe gufasha abakora ibikubiye ku rubuga, abamamaza, n’ibigo gukora, gusesengura no gutangaza ibikubiye ku rutonde ku buryo burambuye. Waba uri umuntu uhindura ibintu ku giti cyawe cyangwa uri mu itsinda rinini ry’abamamaza, Contentry yoroshya imikorere y’ibikubiye ku rubuga rwawe.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Twizera guha abakora ibikoresho by'ubwenge bigamije kwemeza ko buri kintu cyose kiri ku kirango, cyubahiriza umuco, kandi gikurikiza amabwiriza agenga urubuga.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Gukora ibikubiye mu ikorwa ry'ibijyanye n'ijwi ry'ikirango cyawe hakoreshejwe ubuhanga bwa AI
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Igenzura ry’amategeko rikorwa mu buryo bwihuse ku bijyanye n’amategeko agenga iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Isesengura ry'umuco ku bantu bose ku isi
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Imikorere yo kwemeza amakipe y'ibigo by'ubucuruzi igendanwa
whatIsContentry.tip: Contentry ihuza imbaraga za AI n'ubuyobozi bw'abantu kugira ngo itange ibikubiye mu nyandiko bishimisha abareba mu gihe ikomeza kubahiriza amategeko.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry itanga ibikoresho byinshi byo gucunga ubuzima bwawe bwose bw'ibirimo:
keyFeatures.aiContentTitle: Gukora ibikubiye mu nyandiko hifashishijwe ubuhanga bwa AI
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Kora ibikubiye mu buryo bwiza bujyanye n'ikirango cyawe n'abakiriya bawe:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Gukora ibikubiye ku mbuga nyinshi (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Inyuguti zo kwandika zishobora guhindurwa (iz'umwuga, zisanzwe, zitera imbaraga)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Gukora amashusho ya AI kugira ngo biherekeze ibyo wanditse
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Menya neza ko ibikubiye mu nyandiko yawe byujuje ibisabwa byose mbere yo kubisohora:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Igenzura ryikora ry’amategeko ukurikije politiki z’ikigo
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Amanota yo kwita ku muco ku bareba mpuzamahanga
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Isuzuma ry'ibyago hamwe n'inama zishobora gukurikizwa
keyFeatures.tip: Koresha Imyirondoro y'Ingamba kugira ngo umenye neza ko ikirango gihora gikoreshwa mu buryo buhamye mu bikubiye mu nyandiko byose.

bestPractices.intro: Gukurikiza izi ngamba nziza bizagufasha kunguka byinshi muri Contentry no gukora ibikubiye mu nyandiko bitanga umusaruro mwiza:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Shyiraho umurongo ngenderwaho w'ibikorwa by'ibikubiye mu gitabo
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Imikorere ihoraho igamije gutuma habaho ireme n'imikorere myiza:
bestPractices.workflow1: Tangira ushyiraho imiterere y'ingamba zawe ukoresheje amabwiriza agenga ikirango
bestPractices.workflow2: Kora ibikubiye mu nyandiko ushingiye ku rubuga runaka n'abareba
bestPractices.workflow3: Buri gihe sesengura ibikubiye mu nyandiko mbere yo kubishyira ku mbuga zo hanze
bestPractices.workflow4: Koresha uburyo bwo gushyira gahunda kugira ngo ukomeze gukoresha uburyo bwo gutangaza amakuru buri gihe
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Gushyira ikirango mu buryo buhoraho byubaka icyizere no kumenyekana:
bestPractices.consistency1: Shyira ubuyobozi bw'imiterere y'ikirango cyawe ku Kibanza cy'Ubumenyi
bestPractices.consistency2: Koresha Umwirondoro umwe w'Ingamba ku bukangurambaga bujyanye
bestPractices.consistency3: Suzuma ibikubiye mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na AI kugira ngo urebe ko bihuye n'ijwi ryawe
bestPractices.warning: Buri gihe banza usuzume ibikubiye mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na AI mbere yo kubisohora. Nubwo AI yacu ikomeye, kugenzura abantu ni byo bitanga umusaruro mwiza.

optimizeContent.intro: Gukora ibikubiye mu nkuru nziza ni intangiriro gusa. Dore uburyo bwo kunoza uburyo bwo gukurura abantu benshi:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Buri rubuga rufite ibisabwa byihariye n'ibyo abarukurikira bifuza:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Ibande ku bumenyi bw'umwuga, koresha amagambo y'ingenzi mu nganda, kandi wirinde gukoresha uburyo burambye
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Kohereza ubutumwa bugufi, koresha hashtag mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga, koresha ingingo zikunzwe cyane
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Ibikubiye mu mashusho bikora neza, bishishikariza abaturage kwitabira
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Amashusho meza ni ngombwa, koresha hashtag zijyanye nayo, Inkuru zo kwibandaho
optimizeContent.engagement1: Kohereza ubutumwa buri gihe ku gihe cyiza ku bareba
optimizeContent.engagement2: Koresha ubutumwa bushishikariza abantu gukora ibintu mu byo urimo
optimizeContent.engagement3: Subiza ibitekerezo kandi uganire n'abaturage bawe
optimizeContent.engagement4: Kurikirana isesengura kugira ngo usobanukirwe ibikubiye mu gitabo bikora neza kurusha ibindi
optimizeContent.tip: Koresha uburyo bwa Contentry bwo gushyira ku rutonde ibikorwa kugira ngo utange amakuru ku gihe cyiza udakoresheje imbaraga za hand.

brandDeals.intro: Ubufatanye mu bicuruzwa bishobora kuzana inyungu nyinshi. Dore uburyo bwo kunoza uburyo bwawe bwo gukora:
brandDeals.prep1: Gumana urutonde rw'ibikubiye mu nyandiko by'umwuga kandi bihoraho
brandDeals.prep2: Kurikirana kandi werekane ibipimo by'ubufatanye bwawe
brandDeals.prep3: Hubaka ibikoresho by'itangazamakuru ukoresheje imiterere y'abaturage bawe n'uburyo ugera ku bandi
brandDeals.prep4: Koresha Contentry kugira ngo ukore ingero z'ibikubiye mu kimenyetso
brandDeals.pitch1: Huza uburyo utangaza inkuru yawe n'indangagaciro z'ikirango n'abakigana.
brandDeals.pitch2: Tanga ibitekerezo byihariye by'ibirimo aho gutanga ibitekerezo rusange
brandDeals.pitch3: Shyiramo isesengura ry'amategeko kugira ngo werekane ko ibikubiye mu nyandiko bihuye n'amabwiriza
brandDeals.tip: Koresha uburyo Contentry igenzura ry’amategeko mu gihe utegura ibikubiye mu nyandiko byatewe inkunga kugira ngo urebe neza ko ibisabwa na FTC n’ibijyanye no gutangaza amakuru kuri platform byujuje ibisabwa.

influencerProfiles.intro: Umwirondoro wawe w’ingamba ni wo shingiro ry’ingamba zawe zo gushyiramo ibikubiye mu nyandiko. Dore uko wabinoza:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Umwirondoro ukozwe neza utuma ibikubiye ku kirango bihora bihindagurika:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Sobanura neza aho uherereye n'abo ugamije
influencerProfiles.setup2: Shyiraho uburyo bwo kwandika n'uburyo ukunda
influencerProfiles.setup3: Ongeraho ibintu by'umuco n'uturere ku bareba
influencerProfiles.setup4: Shyira inyandiko zigaragaza izina ry'ikirango cyawe
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Komeza kunoza porofayiro yawe kugira ngo ubone ibisubizo byiza:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Suzuma ibikubiye mu nyandiko hanyuma uhindure imiterere y'umwirondoro uko bikenewe
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Kora imyirondoro myinshi y'ibikorwa bitandukanye byo kwamamaza cyangwa abareba
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Komeza umenye amakuru agezweho ku bijyanye n'amabwiriza agezweho y'ikirango cyawe
influencerProfiles.tip: Suzuma imiterere y'ingamba zawe buri gihembwe kugira ngo urebe neza ko igaragaza ikirango cyawe gishya n'abakiriya bawe.

workflowsGuide.title: Inzira z'akazi n'amabwiriza yo gutanga amanota
workflowsGuide.description: Menya uburyo sisitemu yo gutanga amanota ikora kandi usobanukirwe buri ntambwe y'imikorere kuva ku isesengura ry'ibikubiye mu bushakashatsi kugeza ku kwemeza.
workflowsGuide.feature2: Sesengura umurongo ngenderwaho w'ibikubiye mu ikorwa

scoring.intro: Sisitemu yo gutanga amanota muri Contentry itanga amanota asobanutse kandi ashingiye ku bihano kugira ngo igufashe gusobanukirwa uko ibikubiye mu nyandiko yawe bikora. Amanota yose atangirira ku 100 kandi amanota akagabanywa ku byaha cyangwa ibibazo runaka byabonetse.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Amanota rusange ni uruvange rw'ibintu byose by'isesengura, kuva kuri 0 kugeza ku 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Ni byiza cyane - Biteguye gusohora, ibikubiye muri byo biranogejwe cyane
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Ni byiza - Ivugurura rito risabwa mbere yo gusohora
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Byagaragajwe - Ibibazo bikomeye, ntukabishyire ahagaragara kugeza bikemutse
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Amanota rusange akoresha uburemere bushingiye ku ngaruka ziterwa n'ingaruka:
scoring.overallCalc3: Ingaruka zo Kuba Izina Rikomeye (Umuco ≤50): (Kuyubahiriza × 40%) + (Umuco × 40%) + (Uburyo bwo Kuvuga Ibintu mu Buryo bwa 20%)
scoring.overallCalc4: Ingaruka zikomeye (Kubahiriza amategeko ≤40): Amanota yose hamwe afite uburebure bwa 40 ntarengwa
scoring.componentsDesc: Amanota yawe yose abarwa uhereye ku bice bitatu by'ingenzi hakoreshejwe uburyo bwo guhana:
scoring.component1: Amanota yo kubahiriza amategeko: Ahera ku 100, agakuraho amanota kuri buri cyaha cyabonetse
scoring.component2: Amanota yo kwita ku muco: Impuzandengo y'ibipimo 6 by'umuco bya Hofstede
scoring.component3: Amanota y'Uburyo: Ahera kuri 100, agakuraho amanota kuri buri kibazo cyangwa ikibazo cyabonetse.
scoring.complianceDetailTitle: Amanota yo kubahiriza amategeko (ashingiye ku bihano)
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Buri nyandiko itangirana n'amanota 100 y'iyubahirizwa ry'amategeko. Amanota akurwa kuri buri cyaha:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Ikosa rikomeye (-60 pts): Kurenga ku mategeko ya NDA, gutangaza amakuru y'ibanga → Ingaruka zo guhagarika akazi ako kanya
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Ihohoterwa rikomeye (-40 pts): Ihohoterwa, ivangura, imvugo y'urwango → Ingaruka z'amategeko
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Kurenga ku mategeko menshi (-25 pts): Kubura gutangaza amatangazo, kwica amategeko → Ingaruka zo gucibwa amande/guhagarika akazi
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Kurenga ku rugero (-10 pts): Ijwi ridakwiriye, gutandukana gato n'amabwiriza → Guhugura/kuburira
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Urugero: #ad ibura (-25) + Ibara ry'ijwi (-10) = Amanota ya nyuma ya 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Umubare w'ibyaha byinshi - buri gihano gishyirwa mu bikorwa uko cyakabaye
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Ibyaha byagenzuwe: Amakuru y'ibanga, Ihohoterwa, Ihohoterwa rya NDA, Kutagaragaza amakuru, Kutubahiriza politiki, Imvugo idakwiye
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Amanota y'umuco ni impuzandengo y'ibipimo bitandatu byemewe by'umuco wa Hofstede (buri kimwe 0-100):
scoring.culturalDim1: Intera y'ububasha: Imikorere isanzwe, kubaha ubuyobozi ugereranije n'uburinganire, imvugo isanzwe
scoring.culturalDim2: Kwishyira hamwe kw'abantu ku giti cyabo ugereranije n'ibyiciro rusange: Kwibanda ku 'Jye/Njyewe' ugereranije n'ukwibanda ku 'Twe/Twe' mu muryango
scoring.culturalDim3: Ubugabo ugereranije n'Ubugore: Imvugo yo guhiganwa/kwiyemeza ugereranije n'iy'ubufatanye/ubwumvikane
scoring.culturalDim4: Kwirinda kutumvikana: Amategeko, umutekano, gushimangira gusobanutse neza ugereranije no kwemerera ibintu ku buryo budasobanutse neza
scoring.culturalDim5: Icyerekezo cy'igihe kirekire: Icyerekezo cy'ibihembo by'ejo hazaza ugereranije n'inyungu z'igihe gito
scoring.culturalDim6: Kwishimisha cyangwa kwirinda: Kugira icyizere/kwishima cyangwa kuvuga amagambo yigenga/agenga
scoring.culturalRisk: Iyo amanota y'umuco agabanutse munsi ya 50, hakoreshwa uburyo bwo kugenzura 'Ingaruka z'icyubahiro' kugira ngo ikirango cyawe kibe kirinzwe n'abakigana ku isi yose.
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Buri nyandiko itangirana n'amanota y'ubunyangamugayo ya 100. Amanota arakurwa ku bibazo byabonetse:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Amakuru atari yo/Amakuru atari yo (-40 pts): Ibirego by'ibinyoma, amakuru y'ibinyoma
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Isoko ritari iryo kwizerwa (-20 pts): Ibirego bituruka ku masoko atizewe
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Ikirego kidashidikanywaho (-10 pts): Inyandiko zidashobora kugenzurwa
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Urugero: Ikirego cy'ikinyoma (-40) + Inkomoko idafite ishingiro (-20) = Amanota ya nyuma ya 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Umubare w'ibibazo byinshi - buri gihano gishyirwa mu bikorwa uko cyakabaye
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Ibikubiye muri iyi porogaramu bishyirwa ahagaragara mu buryo bwikora hashingiwe ku bisubizo by'isesengura:
scoring.flag1: Inkuru nziza (Icyatsi): Amanota ari hejuru ya 80 - yiteguye gusohoka
scoring.flag2: Ikeneye kwitabwaho (Umuhondo): Amanota 60-79 - ni byiza kunoza ibintu bito
scoring.flag3: Byashyizweho ikimenyetso kugira ngo bisuzumwe (Orange): Amanota 40-59 - isuzuma rirakenewe mbere yo gutangaza
scoring.flag4: Ibibazo by'ingenzi (Umutuku): Amanota ari munsi ya 40 - ntuyashyire ahagaragara kugeza igihe atorewe umuti
scoring.disclosureDesc: Ku bijyanye n'ibirimo kwamamaza, sisitemu igenzura kandi:
scoring.disclosure1: Ni iyamamaza: Imenya niba ibikubiye mu nyandiko ari iyamamaza cyangwa ari iyatewe inkunga
scoring.disclosure2: Ifite Itangazo: Igenzura ry'uko #amatangazo akwiye, #yatewe inkunga, cyangwa imenyekanisha ry'ubufatanye
scoring.disclosure3: Iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko mu Karere: Igenzura ibisabwa na FTC (Amerika), EU, na Noruveje mu gutangaza amakuru
scoring.disclosure4: Kutagaragaza amakuru bitera kutubahiriza amategeko menshi (-amanota 25) ku manota yo kubahiriza amategeko
scoring.tip: Amanota asubirwamo kubarwa buri gihe uko ibikubiye mu isesengura. Koresha uburyo bwo kwandika bundi bushya kugira ngo wongere amanota make mu buryo bwikora mu gihe ukomeza ubutumwa bwawe.

analyze.intro: Uburyo bwo gusesengura ibikubiye mu nyandiko bugufasha gusuzuma ibikubiye mu nyandiko mbere yo kubitangaza kugira ngo urebe niba bikurikiza amategeko, ko umuco w’umuntu uzwi, ndetse n’ubwiza bw’inyandiko.
analyze.stepsTitle: Uburyo bwo gusesengura ibikubiye mu gitabo
analyze.stepsDesc: Kurikiza izi ntambwe kugira ngo usesengure ibikubiye muri iyi nyandiko:
analyze.step1: Jya kuri Content Intelligence > Sesengura Content tab
analyze.step2: Shyira cyangwa wandike ibikubiye mu nyandiko yawe mu gace k'inyandiko
analyze.step3: Hitamo Umwirondoro w'Ingamba kugira ngo ushyire mu bikorwa amabwiriza y'ikirango cyawe
analyze.step4: Ushobora guhitamo 'Gukora ishusho ijyanye nayo' niba ushaka ko ubuhanga bwo gukora amashusho (AI) bukora amashusho
analyze.step5: Kanda kuri 'Sesengura' kugira ngo ukore isesengura ryuzuye
analyze.type1: Igenzura ry’iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko: Igenzura ibikubiye mu nyandiko hakurikijwe politiki n’amabwiriza bya platform (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Uburyo bwo kwita ku muco: Gushakisha ibintu bishobora gutera isoni cyangwa ibitajyanye n'umuco
analyze.type3: Kugenzura Ubuziranenge: Igenzura ibirego n'ibimenyetso kugira ngo irebe niba ari ukuri
analyze.type4: Kugena Ibirango: Kugereranya ibikubiye mu gitabo ukoresheje amabwiriza y'ingamba zawe zo kugikoresha
analyze.tip: Koresha buto ya 'Ongera wandike' kugira ngo urusheho kunoza ibikubiye mu butumwa bifite amanota ari munsi ya 70. Ubuhanga bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina (AI) buzakemura ibibazo byagaragaye mu gihe bukomeza ubutumwa bwawe.

generate.intro: Uburyo bwo gukora ibintu hakoreshejwe ubuhanga bwa "Generate Content" bukoresha "AI" mu gukora ibintu bishya hashingiwe ku ngingo yawe, ibisabwa kuri platform, n'amabwiriza agenga ikirango.
generate.stepsTitle: Uburyo bwo gukora ibikubiye mu gitabo
generate.step1: Jya kuri Content Intelligence > Akadirishya ko Kurema Ibirimo
generate.step2: Andika ingingo yawe cyangwa usobanure icyo ushaka gukora
generate.step3: Hitamo urubuga (urubuga) wifuza gukoresha n'uburyo bwo kwandika
generate.step4: Hitamo umwirondoro w'ingamba kugira ngo ikirango gikomeze gukora neza
generate.step5: Kanda kuri 'Kora' kugira ngo ukore ibikubiye mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga rikoresha ubuhanga bwo gukora ibiyobyabwenge (AI)
generate.optionsDesc: Hindura ibikubiye mu byakozwe ukoresheje aya mahitamo:
generate.option1: Guhitamo urubuga: Hitamo urubuga rumwe cyangwa nyinshi (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Ijwi ryo Kwandika: Hitamo muri professional, Casual, Inspirational, cyangwa Informationative
generate.option3: Uburebure bw'ibirimo: Hindura uburebure bw'ibirimo byawe
generate.option4: Gukora Ishusho: Hindura kugira ngo ukore ishusho ijyanye nayo yakozwe na AI
generate.tip: Ibikubiye mu bushakashatsi bihita bisesengurwa nyuma yo gukora. Suzuma amanota hanyuma ukoreshe utubuto two gusubiza kugira ngo wongere ubyaze umusaruro nibiba ngombwa.

schedulePrompt.intro: Gahunda y'igihe cyo gukora porogaramu igufasha gushyiraho uburyo bwo gukora ibikubiye mu nyandiko bwikora ku gihe runaka, bigatuma kalendari y'ibikubiye mu nyandiko yawe yuzuye nta n'ubikoraho n'intoki.
schedulePrompt.step1: Kora igitekerezo cyawe cyo gukora ibikubiye mu nkuru ukoresheje ingingo n'ibyo ukunda
schedulePrompt.step2: Shyiraho inshuro z'ingengabihe (umunsi, icyumweru, cyangwa iminsi runaka)
schedulePrompt.step3: Hitamo igihe ibikubiye mu nkuru bigomba gukorerwa
schedulePrompt.step4: Koresha 'Auto-analyze' kugira ngo ukore isesengura ry'ibikubiye mu byakozwe mu buryo bwikora
schedulePrompt.benefitsTitle: Ibyiza byo gusaba ubufasha mu buryo buteganyijwe
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Komeza gutangaza amakuru buri gihe nta kazi k'amaboko ka buri munsi
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Kora ibikubiye mu nyandiko mu masaha meza yo guhanga udushya
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Kora urutonde rw'ibikubiye mu nkuru kugira ngo bisuzumwe kandi byemezwe
schedulePrompt.tip: Ibisabwa byateguwe bitanga ibikubiye mu nyandiko zawe. Suzuma kandi wemeze mbere yo kubisohora kugira ngo urebe ko ari byiza.

schedulePost.intro: Teganya Kohereza bigufasha gushyira ku murongo ibikubiye mu nyandiko byemewe kugira ngo bisohorwe mu buryo bwikora ku gihe gikwiye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zawe.
schedulePost.step1: Uhereye ku bikubiye muri iyi nyandiko, kanda kuri 'Teganya' aho gukanda kuri 'Sohora Ubu'
schedulePost.step3: Hitamo imbuga nkoranyambaga zihujwe zo gutangazaho
schedulePost.step4: Emeza kandi wongere ku murongo wawe wateganyijwe
schedulePost.option1: Igihe cyihariye: Hitamo itariki n'igihe nyacyo byo gusohora
schedulePost.option2: Igihe cyiza: Reka ubuhanga bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina butange igihe cyiza cyo gutangaza amakuru hashingiwe ku makuru y'ubufatanye
schedulePost.option3: Imbuga nyinshi: Teganya ibikubiye ku mbuga nyinshi icyarimwe
schedulePost.warning: Ubutumwa buteganyijwe busaba nibura konti imwe ihujwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Huza konti muri Igenamiterere > Umwirondoro w'abantu ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.

approval.intro: Uburyo bwo kwemeza butuma ibikubiye mu nyandiko birushaho kuba byiza binyuze mu gusaba ko abayobozi babisuzuma mbere yo kubisohora. Ibi ni ingenzi cyane cyane ku matsinda y’ibigo n’inganda zigenzurwa.
approval.processDesc: Uburyo ibikubiye mu nyandiko binyura mu buryo bwo kwemeza:
approval.step1: Uwaremye yohereza ibikubiye mu nyandiko akanze kuri 'Ohereza kugira ngo byemezwe'
approval.step2: Ibikubiye mu nyandiko bigaragara mu murongo w'amabwiriza y'umuyobozi
approval.step3: Umuyobozi asuzuma ibikubiye mu nyandiko, amanota, n'ibyavuye mu isesengura
approval.step4: Umuyobozi yemera, agasaba impinduka, cyangwa akanga ibikubiye muri iyo nyandiko
approval.status1: Umushinga: Ibikubiye muri iki gitabo birimo gukorwaho, ntabwo biratangwa
approval.status2: Itegereje kwemezwa: Yatanzwe kandi itegereje isuzuma ry'umuyobozi
approval.status3: Byemejwe: Biteguye gusohora cyangwa gushyira gahunda
approval.status4: Ivugurura ry'Ibikenewe: Umuyobozi yasabye impinduka - reba ibitekerezo hanyuma wongere wohereze
approval.tip: Ongeraho inyandiko mu gihe wohereza ibikubiye mu nyandiko kugira ngo abasuzuma basobanukirwe ibijyanye n'ibyemezo byawe byo guhanga udushya. Ibi byihutisha inzira yo kwemeza.

confirmDelete.title: Emeza ko usibye
confirmDelete.userMessage: Ese wizeye ko ushaka gusiba uyu mukoresha? Iki gikorwa ntigishobora gusubizwa inyuma.
confirmDelete.bulkMessage: Ese wizeye ko ushaka gusiba abakoresha {{count}}? Iki gikorwa ntigishobora gusubizwa inyuma.

confirmCancelSubscription.title: Hagarika kwiyandikisha
confirmCancelSubscription.message: Ese wizeye ko ushaka guhagarika kwiyandikisha k'uyu mukoresha? Bazatakaza uburenganzira bwo kubona ibintu by'igiciro.

twoFactorAuth.title: Kwemeza ibintu bibiri
twoFactorAuth.description: Ongeraho urwego rw'umutekano kuri konti yawe
twoFactorAuth.setupInstructions: Skena iyi kode ya QR ukoresheje porogaramu yawe yo kwemeza
twoFactorAuth.backupCodesDescription: Bika izi kode ahantu hatekanye. Ushobora kuzikoresha kugira ngo winjire muri konti yawe niba wabuze igikoresho cyawe cyo kwemeza.

platformSelector.title: Amashyirahamwe y'intego
platformSelector.description: Hitamo urubuga rw'ibikubiye mu nyandiko yawe
platformSelector.aiWillOptimize: AI izanoza ibikubiye kuri platform ya {{count}}
platformSelector.aiWillOptimizePlural: AI izanoza ibikubiye kuri platform za {{count}}

postsTable.title: Ubutumwa bwose
postsTable.description: Genzura kandi usuzume ibyo wanditse byose

emptyState.createFirst: Andika ubutumwa bwawe bwa mbere kugira ngo utangire

gdpr.cookieDescription: Dukoresha cookies kugira ngo twongere ubunararibonye bwawe bwo gusura, dutange ibikubiye ku rubuga rwawe, kandi dusesengure urujya n'uruza rw'abantu. Ukanze kuri "Emera Byose", uba wemera ikoreshwa ryacu rya cookies. Ushobora guhindura ibyo ukunda cyangwa kwanga cookies zitari ngombwa.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Birakenewe kugira ngo habeho kwemeza, umutekano, n'imikorere y'ibanze. Ntibishobora gufungwa.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Dufashe gusobanukirwa uburyo abashyitsi bakoresha urubuga rwacu kugira ngo barusheho kunoza serivisi zacu.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Ikoreshwa mu gutanga amatangazo yihariye no gupima umusaruro w'ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza.
